review: Lots of great old tv shows here. Not quite the easiest to set up. Cannot be used in hotel rooms, (or at least the one we were in) and the search function could be improved. All in all, a good deal for the money.Not quite sure why some content from my kindle account came over and some did not. That was a little confusing; making me set up some accounts again but others showed up. Odd.
author: katydid

review: I was nervous about the internet speed that we have in the house.  I have had little issues with streaming, despite my lower internet speed.  I love Hulu Plus and Amazon Prime.  The only surprise was some of the TV Shows on Amazon Fire have a per episode or per season cost.  I should have figured that to be the case, but I didn't.  I went to Hulu and Netflix and found most of my shows and only a small monthly charge.Overall, I have been thrilled with the Fire TV Stick!

review: I am so glad Amazon made this available. We were able to take our family room TV and turn it to a great resource for family movie night.  I would have given the rating the 5 stars but one glitch I have is getting to home screen to come up upon connection ... I have to hit the home button on the remote and would rather it just come up. This could be user error and it is not a big issue. Still an awesome accessory for our family room and we are going to get a 2nd for the bedroom. We are even cutting back on our mainstream Dish pkg. Being a Prime member is worth it in so many ways!
